item.title: Contact
item.description: Reach CNSD 2022 Organizers One can reach the CNSD 2022 Organizers for any Queries through our email, cnsd2022@iiserpune.ac.in IISER Pune Address* Indian Institute of Science Education and Research Pune Dr. Homi Bhabha Road, Pune 411008, India. Phone: +91-20-25908000 How to Reach Pune* Pune is well connected by air, rail and road to other major cities in India. The airport is located in Lohegaon. When arriving by train or bus, you can alight at either Pune Junction (main railway station and bus stand) or at Shivajinagar station / bus stand.
